long_description: our staff and members believe in creating a friendly environment for people at all fitness levels. every body is unique. each day you'll do a challenging workout that combines the most effective fitness methods. personal training is the most effective way to transform your fitness in the least amount of time. we are here to ensure you build better healthy habits and systems that keep you on track. don't worry, we'll make it simple and fun for you. our trainers are passionate and knowledgeable, helping you know what to do, keeping you on track. we believe in supporting people who are ready to take action and give them everything they need to crush their goals. it's why our members keep coming back for more. but getting there shouldn't be hard. hinge fitness is located and easily accessible from all of melrose. our mission is to help you succeed. we like to organize our fitness classes into small groups, as this allows you to meet others. our culture at hinge is built on community, connection and functional fitness.
